requestBody: {"tools":[{"type":"function","name":"get_weather","parameters":{"required":["location"],"type":"object","properties":{"location":{"type":"string","description":"The city and country, e.g. 'Tokyo, Japan'"}}},"description":"Get current weather for a location"},{"type":"code_interpreter","container":"auto"}],"stream":false,"max_output_tokens":200,"model":"gpt-5-nano","input":[{"role":"system","content":[{"text":"You are a helpful assistant with access to weather data and code execution.","type":"input_text"}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"text":"What's the weather in Tokyo? Also calculate 15 * 23 using code.","type":"input_text"}]}]}
notes: Function call (weather) and code interpreter in non-streaming mode
